Sentence: MgB 2 was thought to be a reliable choice for large-scale applications of superconductivity [1] due to its low cost and relatively high-superconducting transition temperature of 39 K. MgB 2 wires and tapes have been fabricated using the in situ or ex situ powder-in-tube (PIT) method by many groups .
